Package interfaces

Interface AssaultPartyInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
AssaultParty
public interface AssaultPartyInterface extends Remote
Operational interface of a remote object of type ConcentrationSite. It provides the functionality to access the Concentration Site.

    • crawlIN

      int crawlIN(int thiefID, int thiefMaxDisp, int AParty_position, int AParty_ID) throws RemoteException
      Transition crawling inwards in the life cycle of the Ordinary Thief. (CRAWLING_INWARDS -> AT_A_ROOM)
      Parameters:
      thiefID - thief id
      thiefMaxDisp - thief maximum displacemente
      AParty_position - thief assault party position
      AParty_ID - thief assault party id
      Returns:
      new thief position
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails
